statements: SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT regulation_code, regulation_description FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE regulation_code = 'EWDR001';
SELECT regulation_code, compliance_requirement FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT id, regulation_description FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE regulation_code = 'CA123';
SELECT regulation_description, compliance_requirement FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE compliance_requirement IS NOT NULL AND regulation_code LIKE 'US%';
SELECT id, regulation_description FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT regulation_code, compliance_requirement FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE regulation_description ILIKE '%recycling%';
SELECT * FROM WasteRegulations;
SELECT regulation_name, disposal_method FROM WasteRegulations;
SELECT enforcement_agency FROM WasteRegulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRequirements WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT regulation_name, requirement_name FROM WasteRegulations JOIN ComplianceRequirements ON WasteRegulations.id = ComplianceRequirements.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteRegulations;
SELECT regulation_name, disposal_method FROM WasteRegulations WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRequirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%report%';
SELECT id, regulation_name, enforcement_agency FROM WasteRegulations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRequirements ORDER BY requirement_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, disposal_method FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT enforcement_agency FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM compliance_requirements JOIN electronic_waste_disposal_regulations ON compliance_requirements.regulation_id = electronic_waste_disposal_regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, disposal_method, enforcement_agency FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, disposal_method FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations WHERE enforcement_agency = 'EPA';
SELECT * FROM compliance_requirements WHERE requirement_description LIKE '%record keeping%';
SELECT site_name, location FROM disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_regulations FROM electronic_waste_disposal_regulations;
SELECT * FROM disposal_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, applicable_region FROM disposal_regulations WHERE applicable_region='USA';
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM disposal_facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM compliance_requirements WHERE requirement_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT disposal_date, disposed_item FROM disposal_records WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM disposal_facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT disposal_facility_id, disposal_date, disposed_item FROM disposal_records WHERE disposql statementposqlation_facility_id = 'b5860225-7b43-4b37-b666-3b2388e2665e';
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM compliance_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%storage%';
SELECT location, facility_name, capacity FROM disposal_facilities WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_facilities WHERE location IN ('New York', 'California', 'Texas');
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, category_description FROM compliance_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_capacity > 1000;
SELECT company_name, company_contact_person FROM companies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM companies;
SELECT company_name, company_address FROM companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM disposal_records ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, disposed_quantity ASC;
SELECT site_name, site_capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_capacity > 100;
